channel.title: ABC NewsRadio StarStuff
channel.description: StarStuff is ABC NewsRadio's flagship Astronomy, Cosmology, Space and Science program. Hosted by Stuart Gary, StarStuff takes us on a weekly journey across the universe to see the death of stars and the birth of new worlds. StarStuff's tour of the cosmos examines those ultimate questions, where do we come from? and are we alone? From Einstein's Relativity Theory to Quantum Mechanics, StarStuff reports on the latest news and discoveries in science, with a special focus on astronomy, space sciences and cosmology. StarStuff is broadcast nationally after the news at 12 noon eastern time every Sunday on ABC NewsRadio. The show is also available as a podcast and as audio on demand at www.abc.net.au/newsradio.
